boardgame.name: Level 9
NMBR 9
NMBR9
Number 9
ナンバーナイン
boardgame.description: Numbers aren't worth anything in NMBR 9 unless they're off the ground floor and looking down from above._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game includes twenty cards numbered 0-9 twice and eighty tiles numbered 0-9; each number tile is composed of squares in some arrangement. After shuffling the deck of cards, draw and reveal the first card. Each player takes a number tile matching the card and places it on the table. With each new card drawn after that, each player takes the appropriate number tile, then adds it to the tiles that they already have in play, with each player building their own arrangement of tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The new tile must touch at least one other tile on the same level along one side of a square. A tile can also be placed on top of two or more other tiles as long as no part of the new tile overhangs the tiles below it; new tiles placed on this same level must touch at least one other tile, while also covering parts of at least two tiles and not overhanging._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once all the cards have been drawn and the tiles placed, players take turns calculating their score. A tile on the bottom level _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; the 0th level, if you will _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; scores 0 points; a tile on the 1st level above this is worth as many points as the number on the tile; a tile on the 2nd level is worth twice the number on the tile; etc. Whoever scores the most points wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game: NMBR 9 (Abacus) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German, English Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact frank@spieleberatung.com and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com

Having seen this game at the Gathering, I got a closer look at the UK Games Expo and was taken with its cleverness. The idea is to stack up the number tiles: the higher they go, the more they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re worth. However, the placement restrictions make this tricky and everybody else is playing the same numbers in the same sequence. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £13.33 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £8.64 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £7.20 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £11.40 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £10.70 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
Ship to UK only
